channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report E-2023100567
item.description:
Report E-2023100567

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-23T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-22
  • City: Tonawanda
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: SCHNEIDER NATIONAL BULK CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Driver arrived at the customer and thought he was in position to unload. he opened the dome to vent the trailer for the pump unload and then the customer asked him to move the trailer a few more feet to get it in a better position. The driver chose to move the trailer a few feet without closing the dome lid. When the reciever told him to stop he hit the brakes and a surge of product came out. Estimate is 3 gallons.

item.title: Report X-2023091051
item.description:
Report X-2023091051

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-23T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-14
  • City: BINGHAMTON
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: It was found in unload with the outside being wet. It was brought over to our hazmat cage. DescribePack: One jug had a loose cap which caused it to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: It was brought over to our hazmat cage and put on the fumes hud.

item.title: Report X-2023091029
item.description:
Report X-2023091029

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-23T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-14
  • City: BINGHAMTON
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The box was found in unload with a big wet spot on the upper top part of it. I put it on tugger and brought it over to our hazmat cage and turned on the fumes hud. DescribePack: The one jug had a loose cap and spilled a small amount. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: It was brought over to the hazmat cage with the fumes hud fan turned on.

item.title: Report E-2023090424
item.description:
Report E-2023090424

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-23T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-04
  • City: SELKIRK
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: CSX Transportation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 09/04/2023 at1425 hours, CSX yard personnel reported a yard derailment at QG15 Selkirk NY. Tank car UTLX630352 (Residue â€“ Sodium Hydroxide solution) was leaning with the Bottom outlet valve sheared off flush with the bottom of the railcar. Railcar developed a drip leak from the valve area releasing less than 1 quart of product into containment. Leak stopped when railcar was re-railed. On 09/25/2023, Railcar was cleaned and purged without incident.

item.title: Report X-2023090989
item.description:
Report X-2023090989

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-20T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-19
  • City: ELMSFORD
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet and punctured in damaged hazmat cage in terminal upon arrival. All 4 - 1 gallon bottles of Diversey Sealed Air Suma Nova L6 Mechanical Dish Detergent were removed and inspected. All caps were tightened and secured with 2 of the 4 bottles having a slightly less amount of solution than the other two. Liquid spillage and small punctures to the box can be seen on one side of the box. DescribePack: Internal and External partition corroded by inner liquid. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was stood upright and brought over to Damage Hazmat cage for immediate inspection.
